verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%>. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he whose <S%H6588>transgression<s%> is <S%H5375>forgiven<s%>, whose <S%H2401>sin<s%> is <S%H3680>covered<s%>. A Psalm: or, A Psalm of David giving instruction
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> unto whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2803>imputeth<s%> not <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and in whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> there is no <S%H7423>guile<s%>.
When I kept <S%H2790>silence<s%>, my <S%H6106>bones<s%> waxed <S%H1086>old<s%> through my <S%H7581>roaring<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> long.

For <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> upon me: my <S%H3955>moisture<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> into the <S%H2725>drought<s%> of <S%H7019>summer<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

I <S%H3045>acknowledged<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> unto thee, and mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> have I not <S%H3680>hid<s%>. I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H3034>confess<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and thou <S%H5375>forgavest<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

For this shall every one that is <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto thee in a <S%H6256>time<s%> when thou mayest be <S%H4672>found<s%>: surely in the <S%H7858>floods<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> they shall not come <S%H5060>nigh<s%> unto him. when: Heb. of finding

Thou art my hiding <S%H5643>place<s%>; thou shalt <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from <S%H6862>trouble<s%>; thou shalt <S%H5437>compass<s%> me about with <S%H7438>songs<s%> of <S%H6405>deliverance<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

I will <S%H7919>instruct<s%> thee and <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H3212>go<s%>: I will <S%H3289>guide<s%> thee with mine <S%H5869>eye<s%>. guide: Heb. counsel thee, mine eye shall be upon thee

Be ye not as the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, or as the <S%H6505>mule<s%>, which have no <S%H995>understanding<s%>: whose <S%H5716>mouth<s%> must be <S%H1102>held<s%> in with <S%H4964>bit<s%> and <S%H7448>bridle<s%>, <S%H1077>lest<s%> they come <S%H7126>near<s%> unto thee.
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> shall be to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: but he that <S%H982>trusteth<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> him about.
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>, ye <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: and <S%H7442>shout<s%> for joy, all ye that are <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
